name: Power Word Kill
description: You utter a single word of power that instantly kills one creature of your choice, whether the creature can hear the word or not.  Any creature that currently has 101 or more hit points is unaffected by power word kill.
target: One living creature with 100 hp or less

name: Dominate Monster
description: This spell functions like dominate person, except that the spell is not restricted by creature type.

name: Hold Monster, Mass
description: This spell functions like hold person, except that it affects multiple creatures and holds any living creature that fails its Will save.
target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
